header.subtitle: WHY CHOOSE US
header.title: Don’t Worry, bEasy Have You Covered
header.description: Our on-demand cleaners are professionally trained, background-checked, and committed to delivering spotless results every time.

items.title: Quick Booking
items.description: Book your cleaning in just a few taps – simple, fast, and hassle-free.

items.title: Flexible Service
items.description: Plan change? No problem. Easily reschedule or adjust your booking anytime.

items.title: Safety First
items.description: Your home’s security matters. Every cleaner is fully vetted and trained for your peace of mind.

items.title: Professional Team
items.description: Our cleaners are properly trained and committed to providing high-quality service.
